subject: Re: The Ghost Box, is training required?
author: Jon Maronge
full_text:
you are on bear...lol fb #35 against GHOSTMAN #3 or PURPLE GHOST BOX
#33 aka "the demon box"? your choice...lol 

i love this stuff too... shows that people are allowed to have a sense
of humor sometimes in this field. some people take themselves so
seriously sometimes... lol

why not have fun while we are doing research?

jon

p.s. i can start a website and i will ask everyone doing research to
contribute research and findings.. why not have fun to start it all off?

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, black bear hollow
<blackbearhollow@...> wrote:
>
> OMG, I can't stand extreme editing. I don't edit my recordings unless  
> I amplify. That's it. I feel it ruins the validity of the recording by  
> hacking it together. I also noticed that those who do this neglect to  
> tell the general public they edit their recordings to the point of me  
> even wondering if they can be considered credible. So that's my 2  
> cents on that.
> 
> A duel you say? That might be fun! What shall we use? Frank sent my  
> Ghost Box #35 & I really need to sit down and play with it more.
> 
> wisteria, definitely a female!
> ‡•ê
> 
> On Oct 9, 2008, at 8:49 PM, Jon Maronge wrote:
> 
> > bear... i'm up for that duel.. sounds fun...lol best one wins a
> > "certificate of expertification" sign by the us president...lol
> >
> > btw.. one rule bear... no cutting and pasting clips together to make
> > one up. haha
> >
> > --jon
>
